name: Apple
description: Newton's falling apple reminds us that the most profound discoveries come from observing the everyday.

name: Compass
description: Before GPS, before maps, there was a magnetized needle pointing north.

name: Lightbulb
description: Edison's 10,000 experiments weren't failures ‚Äî they were steps.

name: Hourglass
description: Sand flows one grain at a time, never rushing, never pausing.

name: Telescope
description: Galileo pointed his telescope at the sky and changed our place in the universe forever.

name: Open Book
description: Every book is a conversation across time.

name: Seedling
description: A tiny seed holds an entire forest within it.

name: Puzzle Piece
description: A single puzzle piece is meaningless alone. But placed in context, it becomes essential.

name: Wave
description: The ocean never stops. Waves crash, recede, and return ‚Äî endlessly.

name: Vintage Key
description: Every locked door is an invitation.

name: Feather
description: A feather is engineering perfection ‚Äî strong enough for flight, light enough to float.

name: Camera
description: A camera freezes a moment that would otherwise dissolve.
